column2:
vax_cont_all99%>%
  mutate(vax_cat2 = as.numeric(vax_cat2),
         variant_worry_cat = as.numeric(variant_worry_cat))%>%
    group_by(round)%>%
  summarise(
    correlation = list(
      possibly(
        ~cor.test(vax_cat2, variant_worry_cat, method = "spearman"), 
        otherwise = NA_real_
      )(vax_cat2, variant_worry_cat)
    ),
    .groups = 'drop'
  ) %>%
  mutate(
    cor_value = map_dbl(correlation, ~ .$estimate),
    p_value = map_dbl(correlation, ~ .$p.value)
  ) %>%
  select(-correlation)
